segments.text: Where are you going this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have no idea . Maybe I will sleep for the whole day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So boring ! Shall we go out for a picnic with my friends ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds interesting . Who are the other people ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fred and David , my college class mates and Rachel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Gorgeous ! What should I bring on that day ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your tent and enough food and water .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean , we can do many other things after the picnic , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can go fishing , chatting and camping .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are we waiting for ? Come on !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't hurry . Wait for my call .
segments.speaker: S1
